name: Bacon Mashed Potato Bombs
description: Crispy crumbed mashed-potato balls wrapped in bacon and stuffed with mozzarella, deep-fried until golden.

recipeIngredient.note: 5 medium potatoes (about 900 g), peeled (a little skin left is fine)
recipeIngredient.display: 5 medium potatoes (about 900 g), peeled (a little skin left is fine)

recipeIngredient.note: 1/2 tsp ground black pepper (plus more to season)
recipeIngredient.display: 1/2 tsp ground black pepper (plus more to season)

recipeIngredient.note: 1 tbsp barbecue spice (BBQ seasoning), or to taste
recipeIngredient.display: 1 tbsp barbecue spice (BBQ seasoning), or to taste

recipeIngredient.note: 120 g mozzarella cheese, cut into 8 equal cubes
recipeIngredient.display: 120 g mozzarella cheese, cut into 8 equal cubes

recipeIngredient.note: 1 cup bread crumbs (any crumbs that coat well)
recipeIngredient.display: 1 cup bread crumbs (any crumbs that coat well)

recipeIngredient.note: About 500 ml neutral oil, for deep-frying
recipeIngredient.display: About 500 ml neutral oil, for deep-frying

recipeInstructions.title: Prep potatoes
recipeInstructions.text: Peel potatoes (doesn’t need to be perfect). Cut into evenly sized chunks so they cook evenly and fast.

recipeInstructions.title: Boil
recipeInstructions.text: Boil potatoes in lightly salted water for **15–20 minutes**, until a knife slides in easily. Drain well.

recipeInstructions.title: Mash + cool
recipeInstructions.text: Mash while warm, then spread out and let cool completely (about **1 hour**). Cooling matters so the egg doesn’t scramble.

recipeInstructions.title: Season mix
recipeInstructions.text: Mix cooled mash with **1 egg**, BBQ spice, salt, and pepper until evenly combined.

recipeInstructions.title: Stuff
recipeInstructions.text: Flatten one ball, place a mozzarella cube in the middle, then seal and roll smooth. Repeat for all bombs.

recipeInstructions.title: Crumb
recipeInstructions.text: Roll each potato ball in bread crumbs until fully coated.

recipeInstructions.title: Wrap bacon
recipeInstructions.text: Wrap each ball with a bacon strip (twist as you wrap to help it cling). Secure with a toothpick.

recipeInstructions.title: Fry
recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil to **180°C**. Fry **2–3 at a time** for **2–3 minutes**, turning, until golden-brown all over. Drain on paper towels.

recipeInstructions.title: Serve
recipeInstructions.text:
**Remove toothpicks before eating.** Serve hot while the cheese is still gooey.

*(If you want extra-melty cheese, fry ~30–60 seconds longer, but watch the bacon.)*
